name: Allego B.V.
goal:
Allego is a electric mobility service provider, we are passionate about zero emission mobility. Our immediate aim is to ensure everyone is able to charge their electric car, van, truck or bus wherever and whenever they want. Simply and affordably.

Allego is one of the leading providers of charging solutions and EV cloud services in Europe. Our pan-European network of more than 15.000 charge points offers a seamless charging experience for cities, companies and consumers. Allego offers a secure and interoperable network that is open to all consumers, regardless of the car they drive and the contract they have. Allego is coordinator of leading European fast charge and ultra fast charge projects, market leader in services for Public Transport and facilitates over 600 cities and companies with smart charging solutions.
